how_it_works_steps.title: 1. NGOs come on-board
how_it_works_steps.content: We check all the documents and past work of a registered NGO. After studying their proposed project plan, we welcome the NGO to Impact family.

how_it_works_steps.title: 2. Companies pledge their support
how_it_works_steps.content: Our kind corporate partners fund the NGO projects with their Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) budget. A cause campaign goes live on the app as soon as the charity amount is pledged by the company.

how_it_works_steps.title: 3. Campaign goes live on the app
how_it_works_steps.content: Once a cause is live, our users walk and jog every day to achieve the charity goal.

how_it_works_steps.title: 4. Funds get transferred  for on-ground Impact
how_it_works_steps.content: After the cause reaches 100%, the funding company sends the money to the NGO and the NGO shares a project report after the usage of funds. We share the report as soon as it is available with us.
